data.actual_result: The image doesn't upload and shows the "unable to pre-process file" toast
data.short_description: Cropped screenshots do not upload anymore on 8.1.8+
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on Discord 8.1.8  - Take a screenshot - Press "Edit" on the notification (make sure it uses Google's built-in markup tool to crop) - Crop the screenshot - Try to share the screenshot to Discord
